name: Autodactyl
description: LLM-powered educational website enabling users to design courses, learn at their own pace, and share their custom-designed courses with the broader LLM-learning community.

name: grpr
description: ML CLI that sorts audio with fine-tuned Wav2Vec2 projection heads and Gaussian Model Mixture, captions audio with an audio captioning model, stores audio metadata in SQLite and a FAISS index, and labels and queries audio with a local LLM via LangChain.

name: ezvz
description: Desktop app that maps real-time audio events to GLSL-driven animations.

name: mlx
tags: Max 9, machine learning, music notation software
description: Max app that generates musical notation from machine-learned data.

name: bodies
description: Interactive website that sonifies RNBO instruments with astronomical data.

name: bug garden
description: Audiovisual installation that incorporates computer vision for blob and color tracking.
